titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Fire Prevention Week, which begins on October 3, 2010, and the work of firefighters in educating and protecting the communities of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 9/29/2010--Introduced. Expresses support for: (1) the goals and ideals of Fire Prevention Week; and (2) the work of firefighters in educating and protecting U.S. communities.
